rungs.name: Sensor Validity Check
rungs.comment: Check if reading is above dead band (300mm = 600 raw)
rungs.ladder: Check if reading is above dead band (300mm = 600 raw)

rungs.name: Sensor Fault Detection
rungs.comment: Sensor fault if reading below dead band
rungs.ladder: Sensor fault if reading below dead band

rungs.name: Auto Mode Hysteresis
rungs.comment: Start pump at low level, stop at high level (hysteresis 1000-1500mm)
rungs.ladder: Start pump at low level, stop at high level (hysteresis 1000-1500mm)

rungs.name: Pump Run Control
rungs.comment: Pump runs in Auto mode with AUTO_CMD, or Manual with PB_START
rungs.ladder: Pump runs in Auto mode with AUTO_CMD, or Manual with PB_START

rungs.name: HMI Raw Level
rungs.comment: Copy raw analog value to %MW0 for HMI access
rungs.ladder: Copy raw analog value to %MW0 for HMI access

rungs.name: HMI Actual Level
rungs.comment: Calculate actual tank level: 2000 - (distance). Scale: raw/2 = distance(mm), level = 2000 - distance
rungs.ladder: Calculate actual tank level: 2000 - (distance). Scale: raw/2 = distance(mm), level = 2000 - distance
